message.content:
I need to identify the cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period from the given financial statements.

Looking at the cash flow statement, I can see a specific line item called "Beginning Balance" under the "Cash and Cash Equivalents" section:

| Account | Amount | Date |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Cash and Cash Equivalents |  | 2024-02-01 |
| Beginning Balance  | 8000000.00 | 2024-02-01 |

This clearly shows that the beginning balance of cash and cash equivalents was 8,000,000.00.

I can also verify this by looking at the balance sheet, which shows the initial amounts for "Cash on Hand" (3,000,000.00) and "Bank Deposits" (5,000,000.00) as of 2023-12-31. These two accounts together would typically constitute cash and cash equivalents:
3,000,000.00 + 5,000,000.00 = 8,000,000.00

Therefore, the cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period is 8,000,000.00.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '8000000.00'} }
```
